group.description:
In the world of modern music, lyrics tend towards blasphemous and subversive. Simultaneously, instrumentals are often overlooked because of their lack of words to sing along with. Sometimes, you just want to hear some good melodies without worrying about expletives or false teaching. That's what this group is for.

Share whatever instrumental music you think is great. Orchestras, video game soundtracks, backing tracks of pop classics with ONLY the instruments audible, and so forth.

Use of voices as an instrument (as in "doobie doo", "la la la", "ahhhh", or even "hey") is allowed, but not recommended due to the potential difficulty in determining what's a foreign language and what's just stringing syllables together.

Digitally-isolated instrumentals are strongly discouraged since you tend to still be able to hear the lyrics when using headphones. Karaoke remakes are also discouraged due to their typically mediocre quality (and tendency to show the lyrics on-screen in their videos).

Group created and run by @Zebulan.
group.title: Instrumental Music

card.title: Dont #EndTheFed! Just Change The Owners Instead - Eric (WhoRU??) Williams October 2, 2007

_source.content: THE END OF TAXATION -- RE-ENGINEERING THE FINANCIAL SYSTEM:What if we didn’t have to pay any taxes? Is that possible?People often quote Benjamin Franklin as saying, “Nothing is certain except death and taxes”. But is that really true? I'm not sure how we get around death of the body, but taxes--Hell no. TAXATION ENFORCED BY ARMED GOVERNMENT THUGS IS “INVOLUNTARY SERVITUDE” WHICH IS SLAVERY. IT IS UNLAWFUL!The Supreme Law of the Land states in the 13th Amendment, US Constitution:“Neither slavery nor involuntary servitude, except as a punishment for crime whereof the party shall have been duly convicted, shall exist within the United States, or any place subject to their jurisdiction.”Eric Williams studied the Federal Reserve for several years and came up with a very positive solution that no one else seems to be talking about.He proposed that the states and local communities take the Federal Reserve away from the banksters. After all, why give all this principal and interest money to banksters who create fake money out of nothing with just a key stroke on a computer? If anyone else did this they'd be spending quite a few years in prison. Also, the US Constitution does NOT give Congress the power to delegate a private banking cartel to create fake money.Eric Williams figured out a way to simply move the current banking system into the hands of the real sovereigns, We the People. Nothing else would actually change. People can still get loans on homes, cars, credit cards, you name it. The only change is that all that interest money would go back to government at all levels and not to the banksters. Eric said that from the research he did that this would replace the need for taxes. I agree with Eric.The problem now of course is to restore the ORIGINAL constitutional government which does not include the 14th or 16th Amendments. Of course, we can question the national debt! It's based on fraud and is unconstitutional. Fraud vitiates everything.Since all three branches of government have been overthrown by criminals we'd have to handle that first. (But, of course, we need to handle this anyway with our own "Great Reject" solution.In the meantime we need to realize that the “government” is actually murdering US citizens. Some states have used the US military (“National Guard”) to administer the kill shots to people and that now includes children. Where is the outrage?Well, here’s a thought: Since they are waging wars against us and murdering us, why not just stop paying taxes?The 2nd American Evolution can be non-violent. Just don’t comply with any of their unconstitutional mandates and that includes “taxes”. After all, we are now being given the choice between becoming a wi-fi, mind-controlled slave or death by the needle. What do we have to lose?Eric Williams radio show:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zc2Yd9bbMVQ&list=PLTzSl5rGxVsY44EK6Xvl8RMq29Vw7OrVH

The Supreme Law of the Land states in the 13th Amendment, US Constitution:

Since all three branches of government have been overthrown by criminals we'd have to handle that first. (But, of course, we need to handle this anyway with our own "Great Reject" solution.

card.title: Biden admin colluded with social media companies to censor speech, state AGs say

_source.content: #1stAmendment #BigTech #SocialMedia #Censorship #CDCBiden admin colluded with social media companies to censor speech, state AGs sayTwo state attorneys general filed a discovery dispute in federal court Wednesday asking a judge to force the Department of Justice (DOJ) to turn over communications between high-ranking government officials and major social media companies.Back in May, Missouri Attorney General Eric Schmitt and Louisiana Attorney General Jeff Landry filed a lawsuit seeking to uncover collusion between major social media companies and the federal government to censor free speech around topics such as COVID-19.The courts subsequently required the Biden administration to turn over communications between federal officials and social media companies, according to Schmitt, who argues the communications they obtained already reveal an extensive "Censorship Enterprise" between the two entities that spans dozens of federal officials across at least eleven agencies.According to Schmitt and Landry's joint statement on discovery disputes filed in Louisiana District Court, the documents the Biden administration handed over indicate 45 federal officials at the Department of Homeland Security, the Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Disease and the Office of the Surgeon General communicate with social-media platforms about misinformation and censorship.  More...https://wpde.com/news/nation-world/biden-admin-colluded-with-social-media-companies-to-censor-speech-state-ags-say
_source.contentraw:
#1stAmendment #BigTech #SocialMedia #Censorship #CDC

Biden admin colluded with social media companies to censor speech, state AGs say

Two state attorneys general filed a discovery dispute in federal court Wednesday asking a judge to force the Department of Justice (DOJ) to turn over communications between high-ranking government officials and major social media companies.

Back in May, Missouri Attorney General Eric Schmitt and Louisiana Attorney General Jeff Landry filed a lawsuit seeking to uncover collusion between major social media companies and the federal government to censor free speech around topics such as COVID-19.

The courts subsequently required the Biden administration to turn over communications between federal officials and social media companies, according to Schmitt, who argues the communications they obtained already reveal an extensive "Censorship Enterprise" between the two entities that spans dozens of federal officials across at least eleven agencies.

According to Schmitt and Landry's joint statement on discovery disputes filed in Louisiana District Court, the documents the Biden administration handed over indicate 45 federal officials at the Department of Homeland Security, the Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Disease and the Office of the Surgeon General communicate with social-media platforms about misinformation and censorship. More...
https://wpde.com/news/nation-world/biden-admin-colluded-with-social-media-companies-to-censor-speech-state-ags-say

The Pollen Shoes August 31, 2017

While on a prayer walk and offering sacrifices of charity I looked down to see pollen covered my shoes. As I pondered this, then the anointing expounded to me. “How beautiful are the feet of them that preach good tidings of great joy.”

Psalm 72:20
“The prayers of David the son of Jesse are ended.”

If so why add to his testimony?

Concerning ink and pen they are ended but the anointing expands his word even today in the 7th heaven.

This is what David is doing today!

Psalm 135:1-3
1 Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the name of the LORD; praise him, O ye servants of the LORD.
2 Ye that stand in the house of the LORD, in the courts of the house of our God.
3 Praise the LORD; for the LORD is good: sing praises unto his name; for it is pleasant.”

David’s words were rehearsed by the prophets and spoken by Jesus and confirmed by the apostles. So the ink and pen continues in the anointing. It points to the Spirit and the Spirit confirms the Authorship.

This is proof that ink and pen isn’t finalized and sealed to paper (or 66 books of the Bible) but what the Spirit put on paper continues in the heart of charity.

#S8W #ApostlesToday #manifoldgraces of #God #testimony #evidence #proof #anointing is #greater than the #text

group.description:
Brothers and Sisters in Christ, I’m @shooglenifty and my fellow administrator is @libertyordeath777. 

God is good and His mercy endures forever!
***
By posting you are agreeing to our posting standards. We will remove a post that doesn't follow the guidelines below.
***
My hopes for the group is to foster phileo between the Christian diaspora that has chosen to join this group. We want to be a place where unbelievers come for answers and believers come to be bolstered in their faith. By the grace of God through the blood of Jesus we will bring His love to multitudes. My reasoning? I believe this: "Never doubt God’s mighty power to work in you and accomplish all this. He will achieve infinitely more than your greatest request, your most unbelievable dream, and exceed your wildest imagination! He will outdo them all, for his miraculous power constantly energizes you.”Ephesians 3:20 TPT
***
PLEASE READ BEFORE POSTING:
Posts that are encouraged (think ENGAGEMENT! and WHAT IS GOD TELLING YOU!):
1. Testimonies, praise reports, prayer requests, encouragements, prophecies, words from God, exhortations, etc.
2. Questions of those looking to our community for answers that only God can give.
3. Sermons, articles, videos, pictures and verses as long as they have a good description outlining who, what, where, why and how. If you don't respect the link you are posting or the other Christians in the group enough to take some time with your post, please don't post it. 
***
It seems most just post and run (seagull posting) and this is not God's heart nor mine. This group has ONE timeline. It also has many members. Is it respectful on your part to post several one line posts in a row pushing someone else's well thought post or plea out of sight of the group? With that in mind the following types of posts will be removed at the sole discretion of the moderators:
1. Off topic posts: politics, begging for followers or money, promoting personal agendas, etc.
2. Intentionally divisive, disrespectful or racist posts
3. Low effort (Just posting a video/link is not sufficient within the group, you must also write YOUR OWN description of the link/video; the included video/link description is not acceptable) or multiple posts in a row (limit of 2 posts per 3 hours)
4. Posts that don't meet the criteria mentioned above
5. Any reposts from other groups that are unrelated to Christianity; reposts of posts already in the group timeline (if you agree with a post just say it in the original post); and any reposts of your disagreements within a post brought to the group timeline.
6. Anyone who spams the same post to multiple groups (yes, I check timelines)
7. All members who block the administrators and moderators will be removed.
***
Remember that we are the body of Christ. Please keep your posts in line with Philippians 4:8 (ESV): Finally brothers, whatever is true, whatever is honorable, whatever is just, whatever is pure, whatever is lovely, whatever is commendable, if there is any excellence, if there is anything worthy of praise, think (post!) about these things.
***
“The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face to shine upon you and be gracious to you; the Lord lift up his countenance upon you and give you peace. “So shall they put my name upon the people of Israel, and I will bless them.””Numbers 6:24-27 ESV

_source.contentraw:
Apostle Eric VonAnderseck
· August 31, 2017 ·

The Pollen Shoes August 31, 2017

While on a prayer walk and offering sacrifices of charity I looked down to see pollen covered my shoes. As I pondered this, then the anointing expounded to me. “How beautiful are the feet of them that preach good tidings of great joy.”

Psalm 72:20
“The prayers of David the son of Jesse are ended.”

If so why add to his testimony?

Concerning ink and pen they are ended but the anointing expands his word even today in the 7th heaven.

This is what David is doing today!

Psalm 135:1-3
1 Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the name of the LORD; praise him, O ye servants of the LORD.
2 Ye that stand in the house of the LORD, in the courts of the house of our God.
3 Praise the LORD; for the LORD is good: sing praises unto his name; for it is pleasant.”

David’s words were rehearsed by the prophets and spoken by Jesus and confirmed by the apostles. So the ink and pen continues in the anointing. It points to the Spirit and the Spirit confirms the Authorship.

This is proof that ink and pen isn’t finalized and sealed to paper (or 66 books of the Bible) but what the Spirit put on paper continues in the heart of charity.

#S8W #ApostlesToday #manifoldgraces of #God #testimony #evidence #proof #anointing is #greater than the #text

#prophet #apostle #Jesus

group.description:
For Christian believers who desire relationships with other believers, want to share meals together, pray together, and worship Christ together in a non-religious setting. I wanted to create a way for those that can no longer be a part of the traditional, feminized, business church model to easily connect with one another in their own locality. Getting the church back to Ekklesia.

*Please make your posts relevant to house/home church.

**Feel free to post your location if you’re looking to connect with other believers in your area.

This group is geared towards Community Building  for believers in Yeshua Ha'Mashiach / Jesus the Christ. That are Torah Observant.  The  goal is to follow in the foot steps of the book of ACTS.  Also to obey Revelation 18:4'Come out of her, my people,' so that you will not share in her sins, so that you will not receive any of her plagues;  Feel free to post political articles that show why we must come out of her. Not just mentally but physically. I want you to think community in the sense of the Free State Project, Hasidic communities, Amish communities, etc...  There is much to say on the topic. Just know this is not a new concept and only for those that are truly called by GOD and want to do his will. 

THE GROUP IS NOT FOR DEBATING ! 
ITS FOR MOTIVATION AND BEING ABOUT THE FATHER BUSINESS !
ONLY KINGDOM BUILDING !

_source.contentraw:
Apostle Eric VonAnderseck
· August 31, 2017 ·

The Pollen Shoes August 31, 2017

While on a prayer walk and offering sacrifices of charity I looked down to see pollen covered my shoes. As I pondered this, then the anointing expounded to me. “How beautiful are the feet of them that preach good tidings of great joy.”

Psalm 72:20
“The prayers of David the son of Jesse are ended.”

If so why add to his testimony?

Concerning ink and pen they are ended but the anointing expands his word even today in the 7th heaven.

This is what David is doing today!

Psalm 135:1-3
1 Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the name of the LORD; praise him, O ye servants of the LORD.
2 Ye that stand in the house of the LORD, in the courts of the house of our God.
3 Praise the LORD; for the LORD is good: sing praises unto his name; for it is pleasant.”

David’s words were rehearsed by the prophets and spoken by Jesus and confirmed by the apostles. So the ink and pen continues in the anointing. It points to the Spirit and the Spirit confirms the Authorship.

This is proof that ink and pen isn’t finalized and sealed to paper (or 66 books of the Bible) but what the Spirit put on paper continues in the heart of charity.

#S8W #ApostlesToday #manifoldgraces of #God #testimony #evidence #proof #anointing is #greater than the #text

#heaven #reality #inheritance

card.description: Shocking e-mails show the extent of collusion between the Biden administration and Big Tech to censor free speech.
card.title: Shocking Details Emerge on How Biden's White House Colluded With Social Media Companies to Censor Americans

_source.content: Shocking Details Emerge on How Biden's White House Colluded With Social Media Companies to Censor AmericansPJ Media ^ | 09/02/2022 | Stacey Lennoxhttps://pjmedia.com/news-and-politics/stacey-lennox/2022/09/02/shocking-details-emerge-on-how-bidens-white-house-colluded-with-facebook-to-censor-americans-n1626389Attorneys General Eric Schmitt of Missouri and Jeff Landry of Louisiana are on a mission to detail the scope and depth of how the Biden administration is using Big Tech companies like Facebook/Meta to curb the free-speech rights of Americans. On the heels of shocking comments by Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg about the FBI’s role in censoring the Hunter Biden laptop story, initial e-mails related to a lawsuit filed by Schmitt and Landry show even more evidence that the Biden administration is using Big Tech to do what it is not, allowed to do according to the Constitution.“Missouri and Louisiana filed a landmark lawsuit back in May that seeks to expose how top Biden Administration officials allegedly colluded with social media companies to censor freedom of speech on a number of topics, including COVID-19. We won in court in July, and the Court required the Biden Administration to turn over communications between federal officials and social media companies,” Schmitt explained.What the discovery process has produced so far is astounding but not surprising. Many will recall former White House Press Secretary Jen Psaki saying that the White House was “flagging” posts that contained what it identified as Covid “misinformation” for Facebook.
_source.contentraw:
Shocking Details Emerge on How Biden's White House Colluded With Social Media Companies to Censor Americans
PJ Media ^ | 09/02/2022 | Stacey Lennox
https://pjmedia.com/news-and-politics/stacey-lennox/2022/09/02/shocking-details-emerge-on-how-bidens-white-house-colluded-with-facebook-to-censor-americans-n1626389

Attorneys General Eric Schmitt of Missouri and Jeff Landry of Louisiana are on a mission to detail the scope and depth of how the Biden administration is using Big Tech companies like Facebook/Meta to curb the free-speech rights of Americans. On the heels of shocking comments by Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg about the FBI’s role in censoring the Hunter Biden laptop story, initial e-mails related to a lawsuit filed by Schmitt and Landry show even more evidence that the Biden administration is using Big Tech to do what it is not, allowed to do according to the Constitution.

“Missouri and Louisiana filed a landmark lawsuit back in May that seeks to expose how top Biden Administration officials allegedly colluded with social media companies to censor freedom of speech on a number of topics, including COVID-19. We won in court in July, and the Court required the Biden Administration to turn over communications between federal officials and social media companies,” Schmitt explained.

What the discovery process has produced so far is astounding but not surprising. Many will recall former White House Press Secretary Jen Psaki saying that the White House was “flagging” posts that contained what it identified as Covid “misinformation” for Facebook.

_source.contentraw:
ABOUT ERIC DETERS - SUMMARY
1) I am not a career politician (unlike my opponents).
2) I am a registered Republican with Libertarian and conservative views.
3) I believe our country was founded on what I call the three pillars:  God, Constitution & Bill of Rights and Capitalism.
4) I have a long list of business experience and know what it’s like to meet a payroll.
5) I am feared and hated by the Republican and Democrat establishments.
6) I have gone to jail fighting for clients to receive trials.
7) I support ending Mitch McConnell’s political career.
😎 I have been an ardent Trump supporter since 2015.
9) I am consistently ignored by the media because I call out their biggest donors and advertisers, I support causes and issues they are against, and they are afraid of what I might say.
10) I am tested tough: fearless and a proven fighter for the people.
11) I am not taking PAC money.
12) I will not take the governor’s salary.
13) I have published four books.
14) I have vast media, legal, business, and political experience.
15) I am a “sinner, not a saint.”
16) I’m real, I’m not self-righteous, I believe I can relate and connect to people from all walks of life.
17) I give out my personal cell phone number for texts and calls: 859-250-2527.
18) I promise open communication with you and am committed to being a servant to the people.

WHERE ERIC DETERS STANDS ON THE ISSUES
All stances are underpinned by my core belief: LESS GOVERNMENT and MORE FREEDOM
19) I believe there is no America without election integrity.
20) We must require voter ID.
21) We must end mail-in ballots (absentee ballots are OK).
22) We must end ballot harvesting.
23) I oppose lengthy voting time frames.  
24) We must stop illegal immigration.
25) I support building the wall.
26) I oppose critical race theory.
27) I oppose the politicization of education.
28) I support educational freedom and school choice.
29) We must protect children at school through armed, properly trained, and qualified volunteers.
30) I am in favor of medicinal cannabis .
31) I support legalizing cannabis for anyone over 21 and implementing local control the same manner we do liquor.  
32) We must always fund and defend law enforcement.
33) No vax mandates ever.
34) No lockdowns ever unless it’s the “bubonic plague.”
35) I support medical freedom.
36) I support religious freedom.
37) I am pro-life and accept the exceptions of rape, incest and the life of the mother.  
38) I support our right to free speech and the First Amendment.
39) I support our right to bear arms and the Second Amendment.
40) I oppose red flag laws.
41) I support our right of trial by jury and the Seventh Amendment.
42) I support upholding the Constitution and Bill of Rights.
43) We must eliminate the ‘Certificate of Need’ process to increase healthcare competition.
44) We must eliminate annual property tax on autos, trucks, and boats.
45) We must eliminate the state income tax.
46) We must eliminate the death tax.  
47) I am calling for major tax reform with sales tax focus.  
48) I am calling for massive court reform including more judges for faster justice.  
49) There should not be a mandatory bar association.  
50) I am calling for massive prison reform including lighter non-violent sentences, a cap of 25 years on any sentence (no more life) and more death penalties. ………for more go to:

https://detersforgovernor.com/


Cell Number:
859-250-2527
Prefer Texts

Email:
eric@ericdeters.com
Prefer emails for long messages
http://​detersforgovernor.com
